extension.description:
Just display simple download button with fancy button.
Note: for use with oriclone theme generic button.

    Sample:
  • {linkbutton type="powerpoint"
    href="https://docs.google.com/uc?id=0B-JtBDLaFw8hYWNlMDBlNWYtMjVmYi00N2Q5LTgwNDQtODI4MDkyN2UwNDE0&export=download&hl=en_US" }
    Parameter:
  • type: compressed, word, excel, powerpoint.
  • text: Text, like download or something.
  • href: an URL link reference
